Our Beer
Cosmico India Pale Ale
Available Year-Round
7.0% ABV    69 IBUs
Cosmico was designed for those seeking refreshment and balance in a modern American IPA. Over the course of 14 months as we built Mocama, extensive R&D on our pilot brewing system drove us towards this IPA that combines fruit forward flavors and aroma with a crisp, thirst quenching drinkability. This beer starts with an agreeable, slightly toasty malt backbone that tones down the bitterness you may recall from the IPAs of yesteryear. The unique ester profile of the “Conan” yeast strain is reminiscent of peaches and serves as a perfect complement to the bright citrus and juicy tropical fruit aromas of Sultana and Citra hops. For bittering, we chose the dual-purpose El Dorado hop varietal to impart a balanced bitterness along with flavors of pear and watermelon.
Available in a 6 pack of 12 oz. cans.
Grains:
Two Row Malt, Flaked Oats, Flaked Wheat
Hops:
Citra, El Dorado, Sultana
Yeast:
DIPA Ale
Dune Garden American Lager
Available Year-Round
5.0% ABV   25 IBUs
The statement may be too simplistic to say that an American lager is simply a refreshing, thirst-quenching delivery vehicle in a glass. Craft lager has provided nuance and finesse to the American drinker, and emerging from a sea of lagers in the market is dune garden. Pilsner malt on the nose mingled with noble hop aromatics meld seamlessly with notes of citrus and herbal spice to deliver the new world craft lager drinking experience.
Available in a 6 pack of 12 oz. cans.
Grains:
Pilsner, Vienna, Flaked Maize
Hops:
Southern Cross, Hallertau Mandarina, Hallertau Calista
Yeast:
German Lager
Prosím Pilsner
Available Year-Round
5% ABV       38 IBUs
Inspired by exceedingly drinkable Czech pilsners we all know and love, Prosim is unfiltered and delicately dry hopped. Our goal was to strike a balance between the familiar bitterness of Saaz and the florality and fruitiness of Grungeist, a relatively new German aroma hop that in this recipe imparts the smallest amount of peach, lemon, and passion fruit. The Saaz in this case is Michigan grown Zuper Saazer.
Available in a 6 pack of 12 oz. cans.
Grains:
Pilsen Malt, Vienna Malt, and Caramel Malt
Hops:
Magnum, Zuper Saazer, and Grungiest
Yeast:
German Lager
Moder
Available Year-Round
5.3%ABV   55 IBUs
Our Vienna-style lager pours a brilliant light amber and boasts complex notes of toasted bread with hints of caramelized honey and pretzel. Low malt sweetness supports a clean, crisp bitterness.
Available in a 6 pack of 12 oz. cans.
Malt:
Superior Pilsen, Vienna, Biscuit, Caramel Munich, And Chocolate
Hops:
Hallertau Magnum, Hallertau Blanc, Saaz
Yeast:
German Lager
Rare Cargo
Available Seasonally
8-10%ABV   85 IBUs
Rare Cargo is our rotating Double IPA series highlighting different hops with each iteration. Each version is Double Dry-hopped heavily with a totally different hop bill. This monster typically delivers big hits of tropical fruits, fresh-squeezed citrus, notes of white grapes, tangelos and passionfruit all while staying within its sturdy malt frame. Bold but balanced.
Available in a 4 pack of 16 oz. cans.
Malts:
2-Row, Malted Oats, Flaked Oats, Flaked Wheat
Hops:
Vol 9 (Amarillo, Centennial, Chinook)
Yeast:
Cosmic Punch
What We Do
We aim to create exceptional batch beer that is equal parts technical precision and creative art. Our quality and consistency come from fundamentally sound practices and a mindset that everything matters.

Private Events
Booking Your Event
The Mocama Taproom is an adaptive reuse of the circa 1954 Lasserre Ford building reimagined as an elegant, mid-century lounge. Nowhere else on Amelia Island can you celebrate, entertain, and dine in such a comfortable, uniquely crafted setting. Designed to host a wide variety of events, including parties, live music, showers, receptions, dinners, and presentations, we accept reservations for parties of up to 200. Please submit a form below so we can customize a package for a partial or full buyout.
Submit Reservation Request
×
jQuery + Slick
Available Spaces
The Showroom
This area was the showroom for Lasserre Ford and is now furnished with custom leather couches and chairs along with walnut tables and bench seating. Seats 25, holds up to 70 people.
Mocama Wildlight
Rent out the beautiful Wildlight Location. Holds 75 guests. Full buyouts only. Located at 123 Tinker Street.
